Compilando omp_addition-and-subtraction-of-matrices.c\n
Inicio del codigo de suma y resta de dos matrice\n\n


		Studytonight - Best place to learn




The first matrix is: 

7	15	-12	5	-14	
17	7	14	-7	15	
-4	0	-7	5	9	
14	1	3	18	0	
16	-2	11	-14	8	
-10	3	-19	12	-1	
0	11	-14	-13	11	
17	2	-8	-10	-12	


The second matrix is: 

-18	-15	9	4	-11	
7	17	11	8	9	
-7	5	-13	-16	11	
14	-7	-4	14	-14	
14	-4	17	19	2	
8	16	-15	-19	-13	
-7	-18	-9	-18	5	
0	8	3	-9	-2	


The sum of the two entered matrices is: 

-11	0	-3	9	-25	
24	24	25	1	24	
-11	5	-20	-11	20	
28	-6	-1	32	-14	
30	-6	28	5	10	
-2	19	-34	-7	-14	
-7	-7	-23	-31	16	
17	10	-5	-19	-14	


The difference(subtraction) of the two entered matrices is: 

25	30	-21	1	-3	
10	-10	3	-15	6	
3	-5	6	21	-2	
0	8	7	4	14	
2	2	-6	-33	6	
-18	-13	-4	31	12	
7	29	-5	5	6	
17	-6	-11	-1	-10	


			Coding is Fun !


\n\nCompilacion concluida y ejecutada exitosamente
